name: Trouble at Santa's Workshop
description:
The Game There's a problem at Santa's workshop. You need to find a solution, or children might not receive their gift in time for Christmas!

Trouble at Santa's Workshop is a kid friendly mini tabletop role-playing game where you play as Santa's helpers to help prevent some trouble from happening to Christmas!

Version Française

Le jeu est également disponible en Français dans la section "Téléchargement" sous le nom: Des ennuis à l'atelier du père Noël.

Versión en español

El juego también está disponible en español en la sección "Descargar" con el nombre:: Problemas en el taller de Santa.

In this game, you will find

  • A simple, and rewarding resolution mechanics that makes players want to be more involved in the game.
  • Random tables for generating your own helper, their magic power, and the problem they are trying to solve.
  • A cute character sheet to define, and even draw your own helper!
Buy a Game, Support a Community

Every year around Christmas Time, cities all around Québec (Canada) organize a "guignolée". 

During this event, people donate to distribute non-perishable food, and goods for people in need.

If you buy the game from now until December 24th, proceed from that sale will be given back to the guignolée initiative of the Centre d'Action Bénévole d'Iberville Et De La Région.

If you can't afford to donate, grab yourself a community copy, and enjoy the game.

Joyeuses fêtes 🎄
